name: Marble Mechanics (Rift)
summary: An immersive VR sandbox, simulation, and puzzle experience where you design intricate marble runs with intuitive tools and realistic physics. Whether you're solving handcrafted puzzles or building your own kinetic masterpieces, the game offers a calming, creative escape. Features include interactive tutorials, free play with infinite undo/redo, auto-aligning tracks, adjustable gravity, and extensive tooltips to guide your journey.
